casebody.data:
Raul DIAZ
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 12, 2018

The petitioner Raul Diaz' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 185 Conn.App. 686, 198 A.3d 171 (2018), is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court properly affirm the judgment of the habeas court on a legal ground that was not raised or decided in the habeas court and never raised or briefed by the parties in the Appellate Court?"
